name: Spooksville
description:
Your mom isn't letting you go out trick-or-treating!

As the kid, you go sneak out of the house to go trick-or-treating without letting your mom know. You decide to dress up as a ghost for Halloween. Not very original.  Go out and rack up as much candy as you can  before your mom finds out. When she finally notices that you snuck out, she wants to ruin your fun by taking away your candy. The only option you have is to beat her, using your candy-themed weapons that you collected throughout the game.

This includes:

  • Skittle Gun
  • Reese's Bomb
  • Licorwhip
  • AP-47
  • Lollipop sword
  • And more!

Be aware, that each of these items have their own stats, so make sure you use the more powerful ones first, to help you on the way.
